title: Riot you beautiful creature!!
body:
Cosmic Reaver Kassadin's new voice filter!!! :D

Honestly, by far the best thing thats been released all day!

It sounds so fucking good!
It makes me wish to all the gods that he gets more voice lines one day soon.

Well done! seriously, it is so so so much appreciated!
Hats off to the guys who decided to put a little extra effort in and give a little something extra to an existing skin.

Thank you.

{{champion:38}}
